User.title: User
User.description: Represents a user of the application, storing basic profile information.

id.description: Unique identifier for the user (matches Firebase Auth UID).

email.description: The primary email address of the user.

name.description: The display name of the user.

DiaryEntry.title: DiaryEntry
DiaryEntry.description: Represents a single diary entry submitted by a user for analysis.

id.description: Unique identifier for the diary entry.

userId.description: The UID of the user who created this entry.

date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the entry was created.

content.description: The text content of the diary entry.

mood.description: The mood recorded for the entry (e.g., happy, sad, neutral).

Expense.title: Expense
Expense.description: Represents a single expense record for a user.

userId.description: The UID of the user who logged this expense.

amount.description: The monetary value of the expense.

category.description: The category of the expense (e.g., Food, Travel, Entertainment).

description.description: A short description of the expense.

Recommendation.title: Recommendation
Recommendation.description: Represents a recommendation generated by the AI for the user.

userId.description: The UID of the user this recommendation is for.

date.description: ISO 8601 timestamp when the recommendation was generated.

type.description: The type of recommendation (e.g., productivity, expense, wellness).

content.description: The text content of the recommendation.

DailySchedule.title: DailySchedule
DailySchedule.description: Represents a user's daily schedule for a specific date.

id.description: Unique identifier for the schedule (format: YYYY-MM-DD).

userId.description: The UID of the user this schedule belongs to.

/users/{userId}/schedules/{scheduleId}.description: Stores daily schedules for each user, where the scheduleId is the date in YYYY-MM-DD format.
